welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hobart, a charming city known for its charming downtown area and scenic waterfront. We invite you to explore and experience all that Hobart has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

restaurants.name: BAD kitchen
restaurants.description: BAD kitchen is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Depere.

restaurants.name: Gallagher's Pizza
restaurants.description: Gallagher's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Green Bay.
restaurants.address: 2655 W Mason St, Green Bay, WI 54303

restaurants.name: White Eagles Sports Bar & Grille
restaurants.description: White Eagles Sports Bar & Grille is a restaurant located in Oneida.

restaurants.name: Papa John's Pizza
restaurants.description: Papa John's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Green Bay.

restaurants.name: T. Bacon's BBQ
restaurants.description: T. Bacon's BBQ is a bbq joint located in Ashwaubenon.
restaurants.address: 3120 Packerland Dr (at Waube Ln), Ashwaubenon, WI 54115

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, mainly serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Porter County Airport provides services for private and corporate aircraft, including a lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Michigan City Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and lounges.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
